channel.title: Need help-how to make players only login with the client only
channel.description:
Someone please be kind and help me.
Me and my friend are trying to find a way how to make players only login with the client the server runs on, we don't want them playing with another client, or silab web site, because they wont be able to see our armor and that.
I saw it work before with my other friends server so can someone please help
ty :D

item.title: Need help-how to make players only login with the client only
item.dc:creator: @warner299 warner299
item.description:
@warner299 wrote:

how do I do that? im new at this

Read full topic
item.source: Need help-how to make players only login with the client only

item.description:

make it so the server doesn’t accept unless they have a certain UID
